mapper.select: select V3.*, comments_cnt from (select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, V.* from ( select ROWNUM row_number, id, member_id, title, write_date, plan_date, read, NAME member_name, FILE_ID member_profile FROM ( select BOARD.id, BOARD.member_id, title, write_date, plan_date, M.NAME, M.FILE_ID, NVL2(CB.MEMBER_ID, 'Y', 'N') read from BOARD LEFT OUTER JOIN CHECKED_BOARD CB on ID = CB.BOARD_ID and CB.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} INNER JOIN MEMBER M on M.ID = BOARD.MEMBER_ID where CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} and WORK_SPACE_ID = #{workSpaceId} order by ID desc ) B order by read, row_number ) V ) V2 where rnum between #{paging.startNo} and #{paging.endNo} order by rnum) V3 left outer join ( select BOARD_ID, count(*) over (partition by BOARD_ID) comments_cnt from COMMENTS ) CM on CM.BOARD_ID = V3.ID

select B.ID, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, BOARD_FILE.UPLOAD_FILE_ID, B.WRITE_DATE, B.PLAN_DATE, B.MEMBER_ID, MEMBER.NAME member_name, MEMBER.FILE_ID member_profile, C.ID comments_id, C.WRITE_DATE comments_write_date, C.CONTENT comments_content, C.MEMBER_ID comments_member_id, C.NAME comments_member_name, C.FILE_ID comments_member_profile from (select ID, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, PLAN_DATE from BOARD where ID = #{boardId}) B left outer join BOARD_FILE on B.ID = BOARD_FILE.BOARD_ID inner join MEMBER on B.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.ID left outer join ( select COMMENTS.ID, WRITE_DATE, CONTENT, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER.NAME, MEMBER.FILE_ID from COMMENTS inner join MEMBER on COMMENTS.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.ID) C on B.ID = C.BOARD_ID order by comments_id

select count(*) from (select id from BOARD where WORK_SPACE_ID = #{workSpaceId} and CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}) B left outer join (select BOARD_ID from CHECKED_BOARD where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}) CB on ID = BOARD_ID where BOARD_ID is null
